description: Gets readiness for a cell. Aggregates the readiness of all the resources that are associated with the cell into a single value.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that identifies which batch of results you want to see.

nested_items.name: Readiness
nested_items.description: The readiness at a cell level.

nested_items.name: ReadinessChecks
nested_items.description: Summaries for the readiness checks that make up the cell.

nested_items.name: Readiness
nested_items.description: The readiness status of this readiness check.

nested_items.name: ReadinessCheckName
nested_items.description: The name of a readiness check.
